verses.verse: Know <WH3045> you the time <WH6256> when the wild goats <WH3277> of the rock <WH5553> bring forth <WH3205>? or can you mark <WH8104> when the deers <WH355> do calve <WH2342>?
Can you number <WH5608> the months <WH3391> that they fulfill <WH4390>? or know <WH3045> you the time <WH6256> when they bring forth <WH3205>?
They bow <WH3766> themselves <WH6398>, they bring forth their young ones <WH3206>, they cast out <WH7971> their sorrows <WH2256>.
Their young ones <WH1121> are in good liking <WH2492>, they grow up <WH7235> with corn <WH1250>; they go forth <WH3318>, and return not unto them <WH7725>.
Who has sent out <WH7971> the wild donkey <WH6501> free <WH2670>? or who has loosened <WH6605> the bands <WH4147> of the wild donkey <WH6171>?
Whose house <WH1004> I have made <WH7760> the wilderness <WH6160>, and the childless <WH4420> land his dwellings <WH4908>.
He scorns <WH7832> the multitude <WH1995> of the city <WH7151>, neither regards <WH8085> he the crying <WH8663> of the driver <WH5065>.
The range <WH3491> of the mountains <WH2022> is his pasture <WH4829>, and he searches <WH1875> after <WH310> every green thing <WH3387>.
Will the unicorn <WH7214> be willing <WH14> to serve <WH5647> you <WH3885>, or stay by your crib <WH18>?
Can you bind <WH7194> the unicorn <WH7214> with his band <WH5688> in the furrow <WH8525>? or will he harrow <WH7702> the valleys <WH6010> after you <WH310>?
Will you trust <WH982> him <WH3581>, because his strength is great <WH7227>? or will you leave <WH5800> your labor to him <WH3018>?
Will you believe <WH539> him <WH7725>, that he will bring home your seed <WH2233>, and gather <WH622> it into your barn <WH1637>?
Gave you the good <WH7443> wings <WH3671> unto the peacocks <WH5965>? or wings <WH84> and feathers <WH2624> unto the ostrich <WH5133>?
Which leaves <WH5800> her eggs <WH1000> in the earth <WH776>, and warms <WH2552> them in dust <WH6083>,
And forgets <WH7911> that the foot <WH7272> may crush <WH2115> them <WH7704>, or that the wild animal <WH2416> may break them <WH1758>.
She is hardened <WH7188> against her young ones <WH1121>, as though they were not <WH3808> hers <WH3018>: her labor is in vain <WH7385> without fear <WH6343>;
Because God <WH433> has deprived <WH5382> her of wisdom <WH2451>, neither has he imparted <WH2505> to her understanding <WH998>.
At the time <WH6256> she lifts up <WH4754> herself on high <WH4791>, she scorns <WH7832> the horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392>.
Have you given <WH5414> the horse <WH5483> strength <WH1369>? have you clothed <WH3847> his neck <WH6677> with thunder <WH7483>?
Can you make him afraid <WH7493> as a grasshopper <WH697>? the glory <WH1935> of his nostrils <WH5170> is terrible <WH367>.
He paws <WH2658> in the valley <WH6010>, and rejoices <WH7797> in his strength <WH3581>: he goes on <WH3318> to meet <WH7125> the armed men <WH5402>.
He mocks <WH7832> at fear <WH6343>, and is not afraid <WH2865>; neither turns he back <WH7725> from <WH6440> the sword <WH2719>.
The quiver <WH827> rattles <WH7439> against him <WH3851>, the glittering spear <WH2595> and the shield <WH3591>.
He swallows <WH1572> the ground <WH776> with fierceness <WH7494> and rage <WH7267>: neither believes <WH539> he that it is the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>.

He says <WH559> among <WH1767> the trumpets <WH7782>, Ha <WH1889>, ha <WH1889>; and he smells <WH7306> the battle <WH4421> afar off <WH7350>, the thunder <WH7482> of the captains <WH8269>, and the shouting <WH8643>.
Does the hawk <WH5322> fly <WH82> by your wisdom <WH998>, and stretch <WH6566> her wings <WH3671> toward the south <WH8486>?
Does the eagle <WH5404> mountain up <WH1361> at your command <WH6310>, and make <WH7311> her nest <WH7064> on high <WH7311>?
She dwells <WH7931> and stays <WH3885> on the rock <WH5553>, upon the crag <WH8127> of the rock <WH5553>, and the strong place <WH4686>.
From there she seeks <WH2658> the prey <WH400>, and her eyes <WH5869> behold <WH5027> afar off <WH7350>.
Her young ones <WH667> also suck up <WH5966> blood <WH1818>: and where the slain <WH2491> are <WH1931>, there is she.
